title: Daisy Ridley looks radiant as she goes makeup free while running errands
text:
The final trailer for her film Star Wars: The Rise Of Skywalker has just been released, giving fans a glimpse at the hotly-anticipated series conclusion.

Yet Daisy Ridley looked oblivious to the excitement over the upcoming blockbuster as she stepped out in London on Thursday to collect her dry cleaning.

The actress, 27, kept it casual in colourful leggings and a large white jumper as she braved the rain to complete her chores.

Casual: Daisy Ridley, 27, looked relaxed as she went out in leggings and a large jumper to collect her dry cleaning in rainy London on Thursday

Daisy showed off her toned figure in a pair of leggings and finished off her relaxed look with some black trainers.

The Star Wars actress pulled half of her short brunette hair back as she crossed the road, tying it into a small pony tail on the top of her head.

Daisy had opted to go makeup free as she toted the dry cleaning, showcasing her radiant complexion.

Concentration: The Star Wars actress had a determined look on her face as she crossed the road holding her laundry and clutching her phone, purse and keys

Daisy's appearance comes after she assured fans the new film will answer questions about the relationship between her character Rey and Adam Driver's Kylo Ren.

She revealed in an interview with Entertainment Weekly that the unique relationship between the two, dubbed 'Reylo' by fans, will be addressed.

While Daisy wouldn't offer specifics, she did mention that director and co-writer J.J. Abrams does give fans clarity about their relationship.

Chilled: Daisy tied half of her brunette locks back to run errands and went makeup free

'J.J. does deal with [it],' Ridley said. 'It’s a very complex issue. People talk about toxic relationships and whatever it is.'

'It’s no joke and I think it’s dealt with really well because it’s not skimmed over,' she clarified.

Both Rey and Kylo Ren made their debut in 2015's Star Wars: The Force Awakens, where Rey established herself as a mysterious Force-sensitive stranger and Kylo trying to continue Darth Vader's work.

Views: With December's long-awaited Star Wars: The Rise Of Skywalker, fans of the franchise will get to explore even more corners of the sci-fi world

However fans were quite surprised when, in 2017's Star Wars: The Last Jedi, they teamed up to destroy Supreme Leader Snoke (Andy Serkis) and his Imperial Royal Guards.

The newest trailer released at the weekend suggested that Daisy's character will be further explored with fans getting to know more about who Rey is in the movie.

Fans of the franchise were also given a glimpse of a new setting in the film, which will bring the Star Wars trilogies to an end.

Character: Daisy plays Rey in the movie and has said the unique relationship between her and Adam Driver's Kylo Ren, dubbed 'Reylo' by fans, will be addressed

One of those settings, seen in the briefest of glimpses in both this weekend's trailer as well as the first teaser for the film, now has an official name: 'the ocean moon Kef Bir,' as announced Wednesday on the Disney Parks Blog.

In the trailers for the sci-fi epic vistas of the remains of the Death Star are seen over a wide swath of angry ocean, which presumably marks Kef Bir's onscreen debut.

The final film in the sequel trilogy, Star Wars: The Rise Of Skywalker, will be released across the UK on December 19, 2019.
description: Star Wars actress Daisy Ridley, 27, looked relaxed in colourful leggings and a large white jumper as she braved the rain in London on Thursday to collect her dry cleaning.
